title: Print, "Title Page, Nouveaux Livre de Paysages (New Book of Landscapes)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower right: D. Marot, avec Privilege
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, lower center: B. Nouveaux Lieure de Paysages.
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: On the right, stairs, with checkered floor and sphinxes, lead to building. On the left, view of the sea, a ship and port, a pier. People visible throughout.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Title Page, Nouveaux Livre de Paysages (New Book of Landscapes)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-1.
